attributes.action: STOP Congestion charge for Minicabs it’s only a service.
attributes.background:
Mini cab is a service for everyone please STOP the drivers paying for Congestion charge. It’s a service for the public.

It’s just putting more money in they pockets.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the issue you raise is not the responsibility of the Government or Parliament. The congestion charge is the responsibility of the Transport for London.

The London Assembly has its own petitions process. You can find out more about how to petition the London Assembly here:

https://www.london.gov.uk/about-us/london-assembly/petitions
